short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the categories of your competitor Google My business Listings. Spy for a single listing or for all maps search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💥 Level Up Your GMB Game: 🚀 Install GMB Spy Chrome Extension to reveal your competitor’s Google My Business secrets. 🔍 See the categories they are categorizing, one at a time, or look through all results maps. 
🗺️ It shows you categories for any listing or across all map searches, so you can always stay ahead. 🏆

How to use: 🔄

1. 🌐 Open the chrome webstore and look for GMB spy chrome extension

2. Install the extension and press Add to Chrome button. 🛠️

3. Click Add extension in the popped-up window upon installation. 🌈

4. Open Google Maps and navigate to [https: //www.google.com/maps](https://www.google.com/maps) in your chrome browser

5. With our extension, you can smoothly watch categories right on Maps and see the specialized service-related categories for an improved ease.

Features of GMB spy chrome extension🛠️ 

Locate the appropriate category and services suitable for your business, including identifying associated categories, service offerings related to a given choice. 🕵️‍♂️🔍
The navigation and understanding of this extension are easy, thanks to the user-friendly controls as well as informative displays. 🗺️👀

It is absolutely free of charge so you can use it without any cost and enjoy all its advantages. 🆓💼

It is perfectly integrated with Google Maps and has a very convenient interface that facilitates competitor research. 🗺️🕵️‍♀️

Regularly updated, meaning support for the latest Google My Business features and updates are continuously available. 🔄📅
